Description.Text: The Alahan is a 3-star hotel located in a central location within easy reach of a number of transport links, making it an ideal base for anyone looking to explore Istanbul's tourist hotspots. The hotel is located in Aksaray close to the city centre. The area is home to a number of tram, bus and metro stations, which provide easy access to Istanbul's main tourist attractions, such as the Grand Bazaar, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. The building is housed in a mid-rise red brick property and nestled in amongst other similarly styled buildings. The hotel's leisure and spa facilities consist of a sauna, steam bath and gym. The gym features treadmills, and messages are available on request. The hotel even features a hairdressing saloon onsite. The hotel's restaurant serves Turkish and international cuisine in an open buffet style. Guests can also enjoy their favourite international drinks and a wide selection of local specialties in the bar and lobby. The air-conditioned Standard rooms are decorated in a simple but comfortable fashion and feature a bathroom with bathtub and shower. A number of amenities are also included to ensure a pleasant stay, including a mini bar, direct-dial telephone, cable television, a combination lock cash box and Wi-Fi. The hotel has a boutique store that sells clothes, jewellery and souvenirs.
